title: Angular Universal App Options Schema
description: Pass this schematic to the "run" command to set up server-side rendering for an app.

clientProject.description: The name of the related client app. Required in place of "project".

appId.description: The app identifier to use for transition.

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

test.description: The name of the test entry-point file.

tsconfigFileName.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

testTsconfigFileName.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file for tests.

appDir.description: The name of the application folder.

rootModuleFileName.description: The name of the root NgModule file.

rootModuleClassName.description: The name of the root NgModule class.

skipInstall.description: When true, does not install packages for dependencies.
